oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A story mostly translated by Louis Maingard about cleverness and the use of it to make a living. 1) Most of the translation on these pages is by Louis Maingard, 2) This story is found in Kora Book I-3.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Lucy Lloyd Kora notebooks
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: [Making a living through cleverness]
